# ElectricityGuidance.Options.locationHasRatePlan

**Case**

Indicates whether the energy venue where the guidance was generated has rate plan information available.

## Declaration

```swift
case locationHasRatePlan
```

## Getting the options

- **ElectricityGuidance.Options.guidanceIncorporatesRatePlan**: Indicates whether the electricity guidance incorporated rate plan information.

items.description: Indicates whether the electricity guidance incorporated rate plan information.
